mean: a special event; a situation that concerns someone; a sexual relationship between two people that are already in a relationship with other people

examples.text: Our wedding was a grand affair.
He had a sexual affair with his coworker.
My private affairs are none of your business!
I am interested in international affairs.
The politician covered up an extra-marital affair.
The newspaper exposed his secret affair.
Please don't interfere in my affairs.
